title: Google\Cloud\PubSub\V1\UpdateTopicRequest
name: UpdateTopicRequest
description:
Request for the UpdateTopic method.

Generated from protobuf message google.pubsub.v1.UpdateTopicRequest

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.update_mask
params.description: Required. Indicates which fields in the provided topic to update. Must be specified and non-empty. Note that if update_mask contains "message_storage_policy" but the message_storage_policy is not set in the topic provided above, then the updated value is determined by the policy configured at the project or organization level.
